Translations.Text: (ulaka mutivil) vanam vetittuvittal
natcattirankal citarivittal
katalkal pilakkappattuvittal
camatikalum tirakkappattal (maranittavarkal uyir perreluntu)
ovvor atmavum tan (ulakattil) munnar ceytavarraiyum, (ulakattil) tan vittu vantavarraiyum nankarintukollum
manitane! Mika kanniyam ulla unatu iraivanaip parri unnai mayakkivittatu etu
avantan (onrumillatirunta) unnaip pataittu melana vitattil mika olunkaka unnai amaittan
avan virumpiya (mikka alakana) kolattil un avayankalaip poruttinan
Eninum, (manitarkale!) Ninkal kuli kotukkum (tirppu) nalaip poyyakkukirirkal
niccayamaka unkal mitu kavalalarkal erpatuttappattu irukkinranar
avarkal (vanavarkalil ulla) kanniyamana eluttalarkal
ninkal ceypavarraiyellam avarkal (tavaratu) arintu (elutik) kolvarkal
akave, niccayamaka nallavarkal, inpam nirainta corkkattil irupparkal
niccayamakat tiyavarkal narakattiltan irupparkal
kuli kotukkum nalil ataiye avarkal ataivarkal
avarkal atiliruntu maraintu (tappi oti) vita mutiyatu
(napiye!) Kuli kotukkum annal ennavenru nir arivira
piraku, kuli kotukkum annal ennavenru umakku evarenum arivittanara
annalil or atma, marror atmavukku oru payanumalikka cakti peratu. Atikaramum annalil allahvukke irukkum
alavil mocati ceypavarkalukkuk ketutan
avarkal manitarkalitam alantu vankinal, niraiya alantu kolkinranar
marravarkalukku avarkal alantu kotuttalum allatu niruttuk kotuttalum kuraittu (avarkalai nastappatutti) vitukinranar
makattana oru nalil, niccayamaka avarkal (uyir kotuttu) eluppappatuvarkal enpatai avarkal nampavillaiya
makattana oru nalil, niccayamaka avarkal (uyir kotuttu) eluppappatuvarkal enpatai avarkal nampavillaiya
annalil, manitarkal anaivarume ulakattarin iraivan mun (vicaranaikkaka) ninru kontirupparkal
